oracle.pg.common

Class OracleDataLoaderConfigBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • oracle.pg.common.OracleFileSplitterConfig
      • oracle.pg.common.OracleDataLoaderConfigBase
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    OracleDataLoaderConfig

    public class OracleDataLoaderConfigBase
extends OracleFileSplitterConfig
    This class specifies the configuration settings used for Parallel data loading tasks including degree of parallelism, ID offsets, partitions, among others.

      • OracleDataLoaderConfigBase

        public OracleDataLoaderConfigBase()

    • Method Detail

      • getBatchSize

        public int getBatchSize()
        Get the batch size of Oracle update in batching mode for JDBC-based loading. Default value is 1000.
        Returns:
        the batch size of Oracle update in batching mode for JDBC-based loading.

      • getBatchSizeToDebug

        public long getBatchSizeToDebug()
        Description copied from class: OracleFileSplitterConfig
        The batch size to use when reporting the loading progress
        Overrides:
        getBatchSizeToDebug in class OracleFileSplitterConfig

      • getInstance

        public static OracleDataLoaderConfigBase getInstance(long lVertexSrcOffsetlines,
                                                     long lEdgeSrcOffsetlines,
                                                     long lVertexSrcMaxlines,
                                                     long lEdgeSrcMaxlines,
                                                     long lVertexIDOffset,
                                                     long lEdgeIDOffset,
                                                     int iDop,
                                                     int iPartitions,
                                                     int iOffset,
                                                     int batchSize,
                                                     DataLoaderListener dll)
        Creates a new OracleDataLoader config object .
        Parameters:
        lVertexSrcOffsetlines - the line offset of vertices. Loading vertices after the offset. Default is 0.
        lEdgeSrcOffsetlines - the line offset of edges. Loading edges after the offset. Default is 0.
        lVertexSrcMaxlines - the max lines of vertices to be loaded. Default is -1 (i.e., load all vertices)
        lEdgeSrcMaxlines - the max lines of edges to be loaded. Default is -1 (i.e., load all edges)
        lVertexIDOffset - the offset of vertex ID. That is, the vertex ID would be vertexID+lVertexIDOffset. Default is 0
        lEdgeIDOffset - the offset of edge ID. That is, the edge ID would be edgeID+lEdgeIDOffset. Default is 0
        iDop - degree of parallelism. It has to be a positive integer.
        iPartitions - number of partitions (i.e., data loading clients)
        iOffset - offset of partitions. It is from 0 to iPartitions-1
        dll - a DataLoaderListener object.

      • isSkipGhostVerticesOn

        public boolean isSkipGhostVerticesOn()
        Specifies if edges with ghost vertices (vertices not defined in the graph) should not be loaded
        Returns:
        if true then edges with ghost vertices (vertices that do not already exist in the graph) will be skipped.

      • setBatchSize

        public void setBatchSize(int batchSize)
        Set the batch size used in the data loader
        Parameters:
        batchSize - the batch size of Oracle update in batching mode for JDBC-based loading. Default value is 1000.

      • setSkipGhostVertices

        public void setSkipGhostVertices(boolean skip)
        Specifies if edges with ghost vertices (vertices not defined in the graph) should not be loaded
        Parameters:
        skip - if true then edges with ghost vertices (vertices that do not already exist in the graph) will be skipped.
